bug.short_desc: External global variables referred to within qooxdoo

long_desc.thetext:
But, it would have been further enhanced with a definition clause in config.json and also better visualized and easier to document and only in one place (not per file basis). It would have been a nice improvement.
Instead of printing:
- Hint: Unknown global symbol referenced: lang (com.pc.co.join.App:42)
when you know the reason.
- Keep this message as it is when no definition in config.json. - if a definition in config.json then show only one info message that there is a reference to an external variable.

As already said, please don't cross post stuff from the mailing list!
I don't agree with you that this would be a good enhancement at least not if we should implement it. So I have two opportunities: mark it as wontfix or set it to P5 and never do it... I set it on wontfix.
